= Details =

To use in your android activity:

  * Get your locale
     {{{mCurLocale = this.getResources().getConfiguration().locale;}}}

  * Set up your translation instance
     {{{mI18Translator = new I18nTranslator(mCurLocale.getLanguage());}}}

  * Translate your String auto-magically
     {{{String text = mI18Translator.translateString("Please enter correct keys to unlock.");}}}

  * Translate your Android Resource String auto-magically
     {{{String text = mTranslator.translateString(getString(R.string.menu_feedback);}}}
